com.wizzer.mle.runtime.dpp

Class MleDppUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wizzer.mle.runtime.dpp.MleDppUtil

  • public class MleDppUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class supplies utility for managing a Magic Lantern Digital Workprint.
    Author:
    Mark S. Millard

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MleDppUtil.MleDppChunk
      This class is a helper class for managing a Digital Playprint generic chunk.
      static class  MleDppUtil.MleDppChunkInfo
      This class is a helper class for managing a Digital Playprint Info chunk.
      static class  MleDppUtil.MleDppHeader
      This class is a helper class for managing the Digital Playprint header.

    • Method Detail

      • dppMakeTag

        public static int dppMakeTag(char ch0,
                             char ch1,
                             char ch2,
                             char ch3)
        Make a MleDppTag.
        Parameters:
        ch0 - The first character in the tag.
        ch1 - The second character in the tag.
        ch2 - The third character in the tag.
        ch3 - The fourth character in the tag.
        Returns:
        A four-byte entity (int) is returned containing a MleDppTag.

      • dppAscend

        public static boolean dppAscend(java.io.RandomAccessFile file,
                                MleDppUtil.MleDppChunkInfo info,
                                int flags)
                         throws MleDppException
        Ascend into the specified chunk.
        Parameters:
        file - The Digital Playprint file.
        info - The Digital Playprint INFO chunk.
        flags - Flags specifying how to process the Digital Playprint. Not Used.
        Returns:
        If the Digital Playprint is successfully processed, then true will be returned. Otherwise, false will be returned.
        Throws:
        MleDppException - This exception is thrown if the input arguments are invalid, or if an error occurs while processing the Digital Playprint.

      • isOdd

        static boolean isOdd(long value)
        Determine whether the specified value is odd or even.
        Parameters:
        value - The value to test.
        Returns:
        true will be returned if the specified value is an odd value. false will be returned if the specified value is an even value.

      • seek

        static boolean seek(java.io.RandomAccessFile file,
                    long offset,
                    int whence)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Seek within the specified random access file.
        Parameters:
        file - The random access file.
        offset - The byte offset to seek to as specified by the whence argument.
        whence - The mode in which to seek; from the current position or from the beginning of the file.
        Returns:
        tree is returned if the seek is successful. Otherwise, false will be returned.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - This exception is thrown if an error occurs while seeking or if the specified whence mode is not supported.

      • tell

        static long tell(java.io.RandomAccessFile file)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Get the current file position.
        Parameters:
        file - The random access file.
        Returns:
        The current file position is returned.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - This exception is thrown if an error occurs while attempting to acces the file.

      • isSwapRead

        public static boolean isSwapRead()
        Determine whether to swap on read.
        Returns:
        true is returned if the byte order of the Digital Playprint data should be swapped while it is read in. If no swapping should occur, then false is returned.

      • setSwapRead

        public static void setSwapRead(boolean swap)
        Set whether to swap the byte order of the Digital Playprint data as it is read.
        Parameters:
        swap - true should be used if the byte order of the Digital Playprint data should be swapped while it is read in. If no swapping should occur, then false should be set.

      • dppSwapLong

        static int dppSwapLong(int x)
        Swap the byte order of the specified 4-byte entity.
        Parameters:
        x - The 4-byte entity to swap.
        Returns:
        The swapped entity is returned.

      • dppSwapShort

        static short dppSwapShort(short x)
        Swap the byte order of the specified 2-byte entity.
        Parameters:
        x - The 2-byte entity to swap.
        Returns:
        The swapped entity is returned.

      • readChunk

        protected static MleDppUtil.MleDppChunkInfo readChunk(java.io.RandomAccessFile file)
                                               throws MleDppException
        Read a chunk from the specified file.
        Parameters:
        file - The Digital Playprint file.
        Returns:
        The chunk is returned in the MleDppChunkInfo.
        Throws:
        MleDppException - This exception is thrown if the Playprint can not be processed.

      • dppDescend

        public static MleDppUtil.MleDppChunkInfo dppDescend(java.io.RandomAccessFile file,
                                                    MleDppUtil.MleDppChunkInfo info,
                                                    MleDppUtil.MleDppChunkInfo pinfo,
                                                    int flags)
                                             throws MleDppException
        Descend into the specified chunk.
        Parameters:
        file - The Digital Playprint file.
        info - The Digital Playprint INFO chunk.
        pinfo - The parent chunk of the info chunk. May be null.
        flags - Flags specifying how to process the Digital Playprint. The following flags are valid:
        • MLE_DPP_FINDCHUNK - Look for chunk specified by info, relative to pinfo
        • MLE_DPP_FINDLIST - Look for LIST chunk, relative to pinfo
        • MLE_DPP_FINDPPBE - Look for PPBE chunk
        • MLE_DPP_FINDPPLE - Look for PPLE chunk
        Returns:
        If the Digital Playprint is successfully processed, then the MleDppChunkInfo will be returned containing the header information for the chunk. The file pointer for the RandomAccessFile will be pointing to the beginning of the data section in the found chunk.
        Throws:
        MleDppException - This exception is thrown if the input arguments are invalid, or if an error occurs while processing the Digital Playprint.

      • dppCheckFormat

        public static int dppCheckFormat(java.io.RandomAccessFile file)
                          throws MleDppException
        Check the format of the Digital Playprint.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to process.
        Returns:
        If the file is in Big Endian format, 1 will be returned. If the file is in Little Endian format, then 2 will be returned.
        Throws:
        MleDppException - This exception is thrown if the file can not be processed, or if the file is of unknown format.

      • setByteFormat

        public static void setByteFormat(int format)
                          throws MleDppException
        Set the byte order format for the Digital Playprint.
        Parameters:
        format - The byte order format. Valid values include:
        • MLE_BIG_ENDIAN_FORMAT
        • MLE_LITTLE_ENDIAN_FORMAT
        Throws:
        MleDppException - This exception is thrown if the specified format is unknown.
